data.name: Farmtale
data.detailed_description:
Farmtale is a farming idle clicker hybrid with focus on building, customization, and management.



On a deserted Island, you start with enough coins to buy a chicken. Collect eggs, chop trees, gather materials, and catch fish to gain enough income to expand your farming adventure. Build, explore, and decorate in a colorful world full of interactions.



  • Sandbox Building – From crops to livestock, you choose your own type of farm.
  • Animals and Crops - Buy different animals and crops, and market a variety of products such as meat, eggs, milk, potatoes, pumpkins, pineapples and more.
  • Workers – Hire different types of farmers to manage your ever-expanding farming plot.
  • Upgrades and Items - With hundreds of upgrades and items available, boost your livestock, crops, workers or buildings as you please.
  • Customize Your Farm - Free your creativity with plenty of decorations for your farm buildings - and even animals!
  • Achievements and Quests – Complete achievements and quests as you progress to earn exclusive rewards!
  • Recycle and Refine – Not everything you find will be useful. Recycle items you don't need and spend your materials on something else!

We appreciate all types of feedback, positive and constructive. Feel free to join our wholesome community on Discord for latest updates and news!

data.short_description: Build your farm from one chicken and explore the world as you progress. Buy animals, harvest crops, hire workers for management, and advance through unique buildings, quests, upgrades, and items in the ultimate idle clicker hybrid!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Arabic*, Danish*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 720 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 720 or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
